reviews.content: I have been a medical professional for all my adult life.  I , unfortunately, recently found myself as a patient in a hospital.  It was not a pleasant ordeal but I got excellent care. During this admission Dr.Faltas took care of my medical needs.  I found him to be very personable and careing.  He is extremely intelligent and current with medicines cutting edge.  He is a true gentleman who puts the patient's needs first.  In all my years of practice I have never found a finer person and physician. . Wes Mahan CRNA

This establishment is located off SR 54 in a strip center, basically comprised of doctors. The first appointment always takes longer because of the initial paperwork. . Even with the paperwork, I felt the wait time of 1 1/2 hours was excessive.. The doctor & staff were pleasant. The doctor was thorough & asked appropriate questions & made 3 referrals. I' m not quite sure if he understands me yet, that would be quite difficult after 1 visit & not having my medical records.. The office was clean & comfortable. No medications were refilled, I need to check on that. Overall a good first visit.. What's a girl to do? Gotta wait & see how things pan out, so far it's looking good.

I called and made an appointment in the morning. They were kind enough to fit me in. . My symptoms were improving but I still could not sleep after 3 nights of coughing. The doctor told me to call if this happened. Sure enough, on a Sunday, the doctor called shortly after I left a message with his answering service. . He prescribed me a cough medicine that helped me sleep and I was better in 2 days. . The staff was personable and took good care of me. I'll go back here if I need to in the future.
Excellent doctor & staff. Dr. Wael is very kind and easy to talk to, he goes out of his way to help. I've been going to Dr. Wael for over many years, he is the best.
